recap.summaryText: Barış YAŞAR is a Full-Stack Developer with over 4 years of software development experience and more than 3 years of professional work background. He has deep knowledge of JavaScript and TypeScript technologies. Currently, he develops his projects using Next.js and Node.js.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.text: As a full-stack developer, I've successfully developed over 10 projects. I have experience in many different fields. Here are some of my experiences.
experiences.landingWebPage: Unique websites for different companies. In these experiences, I have try to make interestring and user-friendly designs.
experiences.webpToApplication: That takes users from a web page to a mobile application. After registering, users can log in to the application and start using the service.
experiences.ecommerceText: E-commerce webapplication for a global company that sells products to the USA, UK, Germany, France, Italy, Spain, and other countries.
experiences.servicesText: I provide professional services on these fields. Further details you can look my services.

contact.title: Do you like what you've seen so far?
contact.text: I'm always excited to connect! Whether you have a project in mind, want to collaborate, or just want to chat about tech, feel free to reach out. Let's explore how we can create something amazing together.

metadata.title: Full-Stack Developer | Baris YASAR
metadata.description: Baris Yasar, Next.js, Node.he serves as a Full Stack Developer who develops scalable web applications with js and TypeScript.

recap.summary:
As a graduate of the Computer Engineering program at Ted University, I have focused my career on full-stack development. During my education, I completed two long-term internships; the first was at Altima, and the second was at Osi. Following my internships, I worked at Osi as a full-stack developer for over 2 years, contributing to significant experiences during that time.

Currently, I am working at Oak Technology as a frontend developer, where I leverage modern technologies to develop user-focused solutions.
recap.description2:
Throughout my career in software development, I have taken on significant responsibilities in frontend, backend, and seo. With the experience gained from these projects, I have developed user-friendly websites and high-performance applications. I closely follow modern software technologies and implement the latest and best solutions in all my projects.

My goal is to create high-quality and sustainable projects that best meet my clients' needs. I continue to grow and learn with each new project.
recap.servicesText: I give professional services on frontend, backend, seo and more. You can look my services.

metadata.title: Who is Baris YASAR?
metadata.description: Learn more about my journey, skills, and experience as a Full Stack Developer with expertise in modern web technologies.

ServicesPage.title: Services
ServicesPage.description:
I offer comprehensive web development solutions including frontend design, backend development, and seo.

With extensive experience across modern technologies, I can help bring your digital vision to life. Explore my tech stack below to see the tools and frameworks I use to create powerful, efficient solutions.

servicesGrid.title: What I Can Do For You?
servicesGrid.fullstackDevelopmentDescription: I am creating scalable web applications that offer seamless user experiences. With a focus on both frontend and backend technologies, I utilize frameworks like Node.js and Express alongside modern UI libraries such as React to craft efficient and dynamic solutions. My projects are designed to handle high traffic and ensure optimal performance for users.
servicesGrid.frontendDevelopmentDescription: I build unique and user-friendly websites optimized for performance. My solutions have been battle-tested with over 10,000 users, ensuring fast load times and smooth interactions using modern technologies like Next.js and React.
servicesGrid.backendDevelopmentDescription: I develop secure and scalable backend systems using Node.js and Express. My experience includes implementing payment integrations, user authentication, and building RESTful APIs that can handle high traffic loads.
servicesGrid.seoDescription: I optimize websites using industry-leading tools like Semrush and Ahrefs to improve search rankings. My SEO strategies focus on technical optimization, content quality, and performance metrics to drive organic traffic growth.
servicesGrid.visitContact: Ready to bring your ideas to life? Let's discuss your project.

metadata.title: Services
metadata.description: Professional web development services including frontend design, backend development, and SEO optimization. Let's build something amazing together.

introduction.title: Full-Stack Development
introduction.description:
Full-Stack Development is the development process that involves dealing with both the frontend and backend of a software application. As a full-stack developer, I specialize in building complete web applications using modern technologies. On the frontend, I create responsive and interactive user interfaces with React and Next.js, ensuring exceptional user experiences across all devices. My frontend solutions incorporate modern design principles, state-of-the-art animations, and optimized performance to deliver seamless interactions.

On the backend, I develop robust and scalable server solutions using Node.js and Express. I implement secure authentication systems, efficient database management, and RESTful APIs that can handle high traffic loads. My full-stack approach ensures perfect integration between frontend and backend, resulting in high-performance applications that are both powerful and maintainable.

metadata.title: Full-Stack Development
metadata.description: End-to-end web application development using modern technologies. Seamless integration of frontend and backend for powerful, scalable solutions.

introduction.title: Frontend Development
introduction.description:
Frontend development is the software process that creates the visible and interactive parts of a website for users. This field encompasses all elements seen in the browser, such as interface design, buttons, forms, animations, and page layout.

My priority in software development is designing user-focused interfaces and establishing efficient code architecture. In my projects, I use animations, state management, and data fetching strategies. By ensuring type safety with TypeScript and conducting comprehensive testing, I develop sustainable and scalable applications.

I create user-friendly interfaces using Next.js and React, and deliver pixel perfect designs with TailwindCSS. Each of my projects features optimized performance, compliance with accessibility standards, and cross platform capabilities.

metadata.title: Frontend Development
metadata.description: Create stunning, responsive user interfaces with modern technologies. Expert React and Next.js development for exceptional user experiences.

introduction.title: Backend Development
introduction.description:
Backend development involves creating the server-side logic that powers web applications, handling data storage, processing, and business rules that run behind the scenes. I develop robust and scalable backend systems using Node.js and Express that form the foundation of high-performing web applications. My backend solutions include secure RESTful APIs, efficient database design, and optimized query performance to handle high traffic loads with minimal latency.

Security is paramount in my backend development process, with implementations of comprehensive authentication systems, data validation, and protection against common vulnerabilities. I also specialize in creating seamless third-party integrations, payment gateways, and cloud service implementations to extend application capabilities. All my backend solutions are built with maintainability, scalability, and thorough error handling to ensure reliability in production environments.

metadata.title: Backend Development
metadata.description: Build robust server-side solutions with Node.js and Express. Secure, scalable backend systems designed for performance and reliability.

introduction.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
introduction.description:
Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is the process of improving website visibility in search engine results to attract more relevant organic traffic. I offer search engine optimization designed to increase your website's visibility and drive organic traffic. My approach combines technical SEO fundamentals, content optimization strategies, and user experience enhancements to build websites that rank well and convert visitors.

My SEO process includes in-depth keyword research, competitor analysis, and site audits using professional tools like Semrush and Ahrefs. To improve search engine rankings, I implement structured data markup, optimized meta tags, and performance improvements. Additionally, I develop targeted content strategies tailored to your audience and provide ongoing performance monitoring to ensure long-term success in search results.

metadata.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
metadata.description: Boost your online visibility with expert SEO services. Improve rankings, drive organic traffic, and outperform competitors with data-driven strategies.
